Description.0: Designed in much the same way the Solaris Star class with it being refered to as its sister class.
Description.1: Due to their origins as a redisign of the Silver Star Class, they have a key support and command role.
Description.2: The pylons extend to their full perpendicular position when firing, rather than their 4 radii normal position, this is unique amoungst ships of its design liniage.
